message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. This is a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly unique, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.

I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I'm willing to pay that amount, but I'm not sure if it's the maximum I'm willing to go. Can you meet me at that price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $825000. This is a fair price considering the product's unique value and quality. I'm confident you'll find it's worth every penny.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not sure if $825000 is the right price for me. I'm willing to pay $775000, but I'd like to get even closer to the price I'm comfortable with. Can you consider meeting me at $800000?

I understand your hesitation, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession to try to reach an agreement. I'm willing to meet you at $815000, which is just a slight increase from my previous offer. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and quality. I'm eager to finalize the deal and move forward.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $795000, and I'd like to get as close as possible to that price. Can you meet me at $800000, or is that still not possible?

I understand your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession to try to reach an agreement. I'm willing to meet you at $810000, which is just a slight increase from my previous offer. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and quality. I'm eager to finalize the deal and move forward.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $785000, and I'd like to get as close as possible to that price. Can you meet me at $790000, or is that still not possible?

I'm starting to get concerned that we're getting too close to the end of our negotiation. I'm willing to make one more concession to try to reach an agreement. I'm willing to meet you at $795000, which is just a slight increase from your latest offer. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and quality. I'm eager to finalize the deal and move forward.

I appreciate all your efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $790000, which is the highest price I'm willing to pay for this product. If you're willing to accept this price, I'd like to finalize the deal. Otherwise, I'll have to consider buying from John for $1500000.
